name: 2D Shooter (yash0917)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project!

I made these 3 modifications:

1) I made a Level 3 which was the hardest level to make out of all of them

2) I changed the text for the Instructions Button, so that now when a person clicks it they see detailed instructions of what each level has

3) I changed the name of the game from "Space Blaster!", to "Alien Invasion"

Created by Yash Aggarwal
